understanding.title: Understanding Spring Parameters
understanding.stiffness: Higher values create faster, more abrupt animations. Lower values create slower, more gradual movements.
understanding.damping: Controls oscillation. Higher values reduce bouncing and create more controlled animations.
understanding.mass: Simulates weight. Heavier objects (higher mass) move more slowly and with more momentum.
understanding.velocity: Initial speed. Positive values start the animation with forward momentum.
